head.title: The Young, the Old and the Deficit

hedline.hl1: The Young, the Old and the Deficit

abstract.p: Hunt Cairns letter commends David Brooks for speaking out against Republicans in their fiscal management of nation (Feb 19 Op-Ed column)

block.p: It was heartening to see David Brooks concede that there are serious problems with the way the Bush administration and the Republican leadership in Congress are managing the country. I knew that there had to be a rational conservative out there who didn't buy into the financial tricks being used to justify our large deficits and ill-conceived policies.

It was heartening to see David Brooks concede that there are serious problems with the way the Bush administration and the Republican leadership in Congress are managing the country. I knew that there had to be a rational conservative out there who didn't buy into the financial tricks being used to justify our large deficits and ill-conceived policies.
I imagine that Mr. Brooks might face some criticism in conservative circles for his critique, but he has gained credibility for his courage.
